channel.title: Whonix Logo on Welcome Page - Ascii Art V.S. PNG
channel.description:
Continuing the discussion from [The 7.0.9 release broke the Whonix landing page in Tor Browser](http://forums.kkkkkkkkkk63ava6.onion/t/the-7-0-9-release-broke-the-whonix-landing-page-in-tor-browser/4489/6):
Soon there will be an ascii art logo appearing on the Whonix Welcome Page in Tor Browser as a **workaround** to this problem: http://forums.kkkkkkkkkk63ava6.onion/t/the-7-0-9-release-broke-the-whonix-landing-page-in-tor-browser/4489/3
https://forums.whonix.org/uploads/default/original/2X/f/f477bd4008f11f4f0c701f20c587a035ddfdc803.png
Do you prefer the old PNG logo or the Ascii Art one? Your vote will determine which one will be adopted eventually after the problem gets fixed.
[poll min=2 max=3] * I prefer the PNG logo * I prefer the Ascii Art logo [/poll]

item.title: Whonix Logo on Welcome Page - Ascii Art V.S. PNG
item.dc:creator: iry
item.description:
Continuing the discussion from The 7.0.9 release broke the Whonix landing page in Tor Browser:

Soon there will be an ascii art logo appearing on the Whonix Welcome Page in Tor Browser as a workaround to this problem: http://forums.kkkkkkkkkk63ava6.onion/t/the-7-0-9-release-broke-the-whonix-landing-page-in-tor-browser/4489/3

https://forums.whonix.org/uploads/default/original/2X/f/f477bd4008f11f4f0c701f20c587a035ddfdc803.png

Do you prefer the old PNG logo or the Ascii Art one? Your vote will determine which one will be adopted eventually after the problem gets fixed.

Click to view the poll.

Read full topic
item.source: Whonix Logo on Welcome Page - Ascii Art V.S. PNG
